newsitem.title: CHINA: China Jianshe H1 profits 23.47 mln yuan.
newsitem.headline: China Jianshe H1 profits 23.47 mln yuan.

text.p: China's Shenzhen North Jianshe Motorcycle Co Ltd posted net profits of 23.47 million yuan for the first half of 1997, the Shenzhen Stock Exchange said on Monday.
Per-share net profits reached 0.05 yuan and revenue was 1.02 billion yuan in the first six months, the exchange said in a notice issued after the market closed.
It did not specify whether the results were compiled under Chinese or international accounting standards and gave no comparative figures.
For the same period in 1996, the company posted net profits of 48.31 million yuan based on international standards.
Under Chinese standards, 1996 interim net profits were 57.06 million yuan.
